com.samsung.samm.common

Class SObjectText

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.samm.common.SObject
      • com.samsung.samm.common.SObjectText
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SDataPageMemo

    public class SObjectText
extends SObject
    Class for exchanging text object data.
    Since:
    S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

    • Method Detail

      • setStyle

        public boolean setStyle(int nStyle)
        Sets the style of the text object.
        Parameters:
        nStyle - The text style can be any combination of the following styles :
        - SObjectText.SAMM_TEXT_STYLE_NONE (no text style found)
        - SObjectText.SAMM_TEXT_STYLE_BOLD (text style - bold)
        - SObjectText.SAMM_TEXT_STYLE_ITALIC (text style - italic)
        - SObjectText.SAMM_TEXT_STYLE_UNDERLINE (text style - underline)
        Multiple styles can be set by separating them with pipes. For example: (SObjectText.SAMM_TEXT_STYLE_BOLD | SObjectText.SAMM_TEXT_STYLE_ITALIC | ... )
        Returns:
        True for success. False for failure.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • setTextData

        public void setTextData(java.lang.String strText,

      • setTextAlign

        public boolean setTextAlign(int hAlign,
                   int vAlign)
        Sets the horizontal/vertical alignment option of the text string. (This may not be available in some applications that do not support text alignment.)
        This feature is supported in SDK for the SAMM Library compatibility.
        Parameters:
        hAlign - Horizontal alignment option :
        - SAMMLibConstants.SAMM_ALIGN_NORMAL (Left align text - horizontal)
        - SAMMLibConstants.SAMM_ALIGN_CENTER (Center align text - horizontal)
        - SAMMLibConstants.SAMM_ALIGN_OPPOSITE (Right align text - horizontal)
        vAlign - Vertical alignment option :
        - SAMMLibConstants.SAMM_ALIGN_NORMAL (Top align text - vertical)
        - SAMMLibConstants.SAMM_ALIGN_CENTER (Center align text - vertical)
        - SAMMLibConstants.SAMM_ALIGN_OPPOSITE (Bottom align text - vertical)
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0
